column4: hi, I just bought a sound blaster x-fi xtreme audio sound card, and now I have no sound...
and yes, I  have googled to no avail
can't even find linux drivers for it
hmm, so it's not gonna work at all?
there is a link to an openaudio download on page 2
on page 1 sorry; near the middle
does alsamixer list the drive in the list for Select Sound Card (F6) ?
Should say ( for example ) Default, 0 HDA Intel, 1 Creative Labs X-fi
the "speaker icon" and "volume control" they are talking about is the same app as sys>pref>sound..
oh.. i finally found a working .tar.gz link
